channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lidl shoppers say 'stop it' as supermarket releases 'loaded' 89p Easter treat
item.description: The Easter treat was overflowing with chocolate - both inside and on top - and shoppers couldn't handle it

item.title: Expert explains three common habits that encourages rats to plague your garden
item.description: Rats are notorious for spreading disease and can be incredibly difficult to get rid of. So it's important to stop them setting up home in your garden ...

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
